name: Body Essentials Christmas Gift
description:
Spoil that special someone with this gorgeous Christmas duo. 

Body Buff is a refreshing and invigorating body polish filled with cranberry, walnut and bitter orange. 

Body Bliss is a rich and luscious body cream made with a blend of natural oils and butters, Organic Lemon and Cape Rose Geranium Essential Oil. A silky skin delight.

name: Face Essentials Christmas Gift Box
description:
An indulgent Christmas gift including all the BASK face essentials as well as a couple of cheeky little free Treats all beautifully packaged. 

The Face Essentials Christmas Gift Box consists of a cleanser, hydrating mist, day cream and night cream. These products are better known as Squeaky Clean (200ml), Misty Moments (125ml), Face the Day (50ml) and Moonshine (50ml). We have also included a free sample of a face polish and oil serum, in BASK speak, Posh Polish (15g) and Liquid Gold (5ml).

These products usually retail at $190 plus gift wrapping so this is a great special offer up until Christmas. There are limited number so get your orders in now!

name: Squeaky Clean
description:
This gentle, light and velvety cream cleanser leaves your
skin feeling soft, supple and smooth. Some of the lush
Australian bush ingredients include Quandong, Lilli Pilli
and Davidson Plum. Use morning and night. Follow with your BASK MISTY MOMENTS.

200ml

Water (Aqua), ECOMulse USA (Glyceryl Stearate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Sodium Stearoyl Lactylate), Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil*, Lauryl Glucoside, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil*, Vegetable Glycerin*, Camellia Oleifera (Camellia) Oil*, Honey*, Santalum Acuminatum (Quandong)Extract, Davidsonia Pruriens (Davidson Plum) Extract, Syzgium Luehmannii (Lilly Pilli) Extract, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Extract*, Citrus Reticulata (Red Mandarin) Essential Oil*, Melaleuca Teretifolia (Honey Myrtle) Oil, Parfum (natural). *Organic Ingredient

name: Misty Moments
description:
A delicate mist to awaken the senses, hydrate and calm your
face. Shake, spray and allow the subtle fragrance of Neroli
and Jasmine to mystify and linger. An ideal treat to use
after your BASK SQUEAKY CLEAN or throughout the day
whenever you need a pick-me-up.

125ml

Water (Aqua), Aloe Barbadensis Miller (Aloe Vera) Juice*, Jasminium Grandiflorium (Jasmine) Hydrosol, Citrus Aurantium (Neroli Blossom) Hydrosol*, Vegetable Glycerin*, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Extract*, Marine Collagen, Chamomilla Recutita (Chamomile) Extract*, Santalum Acuminatum (Quandong) Extract, Davidsonia Pruriens (Davidson Plum) Extract, Syzgium Luehmannii (Lilly Pilli) Extract, Terminalia Ferdinandiana (Kakadu Plum) Extract, Beta Glucan, Bisabolol, Honey*, Parfum (natural).
* Organic Ingredient

name: Face the Day
description:
A delicious day cream that hydrates and replenishes your skin, restoring its softness and suppleness. Includes many vitamin rich oils and ingredients such as Honey, Red Raspberry Seed Oil and Aloe Vera sourced directly from nature. Apply each morning after your BASK MISTY MOMENTS.

50ml

Water (Aqua), Aloe Barbadensis Miller (Aloe Vera) Juice*, ECOMulse USA (Glyceryl Stearate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Sodium Stearoyl Lactylate), Vegetable Glycerin*, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil*, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Nut) Butter*, Camellia Oleifera (Camellia) Oil*, Macadamia Integrifolia (Macadamia Nut) Oil*, Ethylhexyl Olivate (Sensolene), Olea Europa (Olive) Oil*, Honey*, Vitamin B5, Camellia sinensis (Green Tea) Extract*, Syzgium Luehmannii (Lilli Pilli) Extract, Beta Glucan, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil*, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil,
Argania Spinosa (Argan) Oil*, Rosa Rubiginosa (Rosehip) Oil*, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil*, Oryza Sativa (Ricebran) Oil, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Seed Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive Leaf) Extract*, Equisetum Arvense (Horsetail) Extract*, Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Seed Oil*, Silk Peptide, Bisabolol, Parfum (natural). *Organic Ingredient

name: Moonshine
description:
This beautiful pot of gold is packed with the best vitamins and antioxidants nature provides, supporting the skin’s natural ability
to rejuvenate while you sleep. Apply each evening after your BASK
MISTY MOMENTS

50ml 

Water (Aqua), ECOM ulse USA (Glyceryl Stearate, Cetearyl Alcohol,
Sodium Stearoyl Lactylate), Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil*, Vegetable Glycerin*, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Nut) Butter*, Camellia Oleifera (Camellia) Oil*, Macadamia Integrifolia (Macadamia Nut) Oil*, Malpighia Punicifolia (Acerola) Extract, Marine Collagen, Rosa Rubiginosa (Rosehip) Oil*, Sodium Hyaluronate, Beta Glucan, Vitamin E (natural), Olea Europaea (Olive) Oil*, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil*, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Oil*, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Extract*, CO Q 10, Honey*, Terminalia
Ferdinandiana (Kakadu Plum) Extract, Hippophae Rhamnoides
(Seabuckthorn CO2) Oil, Retinol Palmitate (Vitamin A), Citrus Aurantium Amara (Neroli) Essential Oil, Acacia Nearnsii (Mimosa) Absolute, Parfum (natural). * Organic Ingredient

name: Posh Polish
description:
Smooth and brighten your skin using this gentle, creamy and wonderfully aromatic face polish. The perfect boost when your skin has lost its natural glow. After using your BASK SQUEAKY
CLEAN, apply with circular motions. Remove with
a damp cloth and follow with BASK THIRST QUENCHER.

45g

Water (Aqua), ECOMulse USA (Glyceryl Stearate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Sodium Stearoyl Lactylate), Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil*, Vegetable Glycerin*, Simmondsia Chinensis Exfoliant (Jojoba Beads), Bambusa Arundinacea (Bamboo)Exfoliant, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Oil*, Camellia Oleifera (Camellia) Oil*,
Yellow French Argiletz Clay, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Extract*, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Extract*, Parfum (natural), Honey*, Citrus Clementina (Clementine) Essential Oil*, Citrus Grandis (Pomelo) Essential Oil, Citrus Aurantifolia (Lime) Essential Oil*, Melaleuca Teretifolia (Honey Myrtle) Oil. *Organic Ingredient

name: Boost
description:
This velvety serum adds a radiant glow to your complexion as it nourishes and revitalises your face. Ideal for use underneath your BASK FACE THE DAY or BASK MOONSHINE.

30ml 

Water (Aqua), Aloe Barbadensis Miller (Aloe Vera) Juice*, Citrus Aurantium (Neroli Blossom)Hydrosol*, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil*, ECOMulse USA (Glyceryl Stearate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Sodium Stearoyl Lactylate), Sodium Hyaluronate, Marine Collagen, Ethylhexyl Olivate (Sensolene), Vegetable Glycerin*, Althea Officinalis (Marshmallow) Extract*, Beta Glucan, Hydrolysed Soya Protein, Camellia Oleifera (Camellia) Oil*, Vaccinium Myrtillus (Bilberry) Extract*, Bambusa Vulgaris (Bamboo) Extract, Malpighia Glabra (Acerola) Extract, Citrullus Vulgaris (Watermelon) Seed
Oil, Rubus Idaeus (Red Raspberry) Seed Oil, Rosa Rubiginosa (Rosehip) Oil*, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Oil*, Bisabolol, Honey*, Hippophae Rhamnoides (Seabuckthorn CO2) Oil, Hyacinthus Orientalis (Hyacinth) Absolute, Parfum (natural).
*Organic Ingredient

name: Liquid Gold
description:
A beautiful oil serum created from nature’s finest. This delicate delight is lightly infused with Turkish Rose and Cape Rose Essential Oils. A complete treat to nourish and balance your skin. Apply to
your face in the evening to work its magic while you sleep.

30ml

Camellia Oleifera (Camellia) Oil*, Citrus Vulgaris (Watermelon) Seed Oil, Aleurites Moluccana (Kukui) Oil, Sclerocarya Birrea (Marula) Seed Oil*, Ribes Nigrum (Blackcurrant) Oil, Rubus Idaeus (Red Raspberry) Seed Oil, Actunidia Chinensis (Kiwi) Seed Oil, Oryza Sativa (Ricebran) Oil, Rosa Rubiginosa (Rosehip) Oil*, Vitamin E (natural), Rosa Damascena (Turkish Rose) Absolute, Pelargonium Capitatum x Radens (Cape Rose Geranium) Essential Oil. *Organic Ingredient

name: The Eyes Have it
description:
This soothing eye serum helps nourish, hydrate and firm the delicate eye area. Apply after your BASK FACE THE DAY or BASK MOONSHINE.

15ml

Water (Aqua), Aloe Barbadensis Miller (Aloe Vera) Juice*, Citrus Aurantium (Neroli Blossom) Hydrosol*, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil*, ECOMulse USA (Glyceryl Stearate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Sodium Stearoyl Lactylate), Vegetable Glycerin*, Camellia Oleifera (Camellia) Oil*, Beta Glucan, Actinidia Chinensis (Kiwi) Seed Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Extract*, Eleutherococcus Senticosus (Ginseng) Extract*, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Extract*, Althea Officinalis (Marshmallow) Extract*, Coffea Arabica (Green Coffee) Seed Extract, Coffea Arabica (Coffee) Extract, Centella Asiatica (Gotu Kola) Extract*, Macadamia Integrifolia (Macadamia Nut) Oil*, Rosa Rubiginosa (Rosehip) Oil*, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Honey*, Cucumis Sativa (Cucumber) Oil, Jasminium Grandiflorium (Jasmine) Absolute, Cananga Ororata (Ylang Ylang) Essential Oil*, Salvia Sclarea (Clary Sage) Essential Oil*, Parfum (natural). *Organic Ingredient

name: Thirst Quencher
description:
When your skin is dull and dry you need a thirst quencher! Apply this
mask after your BASK POSH POLISH to hydrate, soften and soothe your face. Leave on for ten minutes then remove with a damp cloth and follow with your BASK MISTY MOMENTS.

50ml

Water (Aqua), Aloe Barbadensis Miller (Aloe Vera) Juice*, Vegetable
Glycerin*, ECOMulse USA (Glyceryl Stearate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Sodium Stearoyl Lactylate), Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil*, Ethylhexyl Olivate Sensolene), Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Nut)
Butter*, Camellia Oleifera (Camellia) Oil*, White French Argiletz
Clay, Macadamia Integrifolia (Macadamia Nut) Oil*, Vitamin B5,
Vitamin E (natural), Olea Europaea (Olive) Oil*, Sodium Hyaluronate, Olea Europaea (Olive Leaf) Extract*, Coffea Arabica (Coffee) Extract, Honey*, Pink French Argiletz Clay, Bisabolol, Pelargonium Capitatum x Radens (Cape Rose Geranium) Essential Oil, Cananga Ororata (Ylang Ylang) Essential Oil*, Parfum (natural).
* Organic Ingredient

name: Body Buff
description:
Rejuvenate your skin using this decadent body polish. Packed full of  natural exfoliants from cranberry, walnut and bitter orange in a gentle cream base. An ideal pick-me-up when your skin has lost its natural glow.

200g

Water (Aqua), Juglans Regia (Walnut) Exfoliant, ECOMulse USA
(Glyceryl Stearate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Sodium Stearoyl Lactylate),
Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil*, Lauryl Glucoside, Helianthus Annuus
(Sunflower) Oil*, Vegetable Glycerin*, Vaccinium Macrocapron
(Cranberry) Exfoliant, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Bitter Orange)
Exfoliant, Camellia Oleifera (Camellia) Oil*, Parfum (natural), Honey*, Syzgium Luehmannii (Lilli Pilli) Extract, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Extract*, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Essential Oil*, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Essential Oil*, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Essential Oil*.
* Organic Ingredients

name: Body Bliss
description:
A rich and luscious cream made with a blend of natural oils and butters, infused with Lemon and Cape Rose Geranium essential oil. A nourishing silky skin delight. You will find it hard to resist this
luxurious total body indulgence. Use mornings and evenings or whenever your skin needs a drink.

250ml 

Water (Aqua), Aloe Barbadensis Miller (Aloe Vera) Juice*, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil*, ECOMulse USA (Glyceryl Stearate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Sodium Stearoyl Lactylate), Vegetable Glycerin*, Theobrama Cacao (Cocoa) Butter*, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea
Nut) Butter*, Camellia Oleifera (Camellia) Oil*, Macadamia Integrifolia (Macadamia Nut) Oil*, Ethylhexyl Olivate (Sensolene), Centella Asiatica (Gotu Kola) Extract*, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Extract*, Magnifera Indica (Mango) Butter, Ficus Carica (Fig) Fruit Extract*, Vitamin E (natural), Parfum (natural), Honey*, Silk Peptide, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Essential Oil*, Pelargonium Capitatum x Radens (Cape Rose Geranium) Essential Oil.
*Organic Ingredients

name: Melting Moments
description:
Bond with your baby whilst gently massaging this nourishing
oil into their skin. Warm the oil in your palms first and then
watch the smile on your baby’s face as the oil melts in.

50ml

Camellia Oleifera (Camellia) Oil*, Citrullus Vulgaris (Watermelon) Seed Oil, Rubus Idaeus(Red Raspberry) Seed Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Oil*, Persea Gratissima (Avocado)
Oil*, Anthemis Nobilis (Chamomile Roman) Essential Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Essential Oil, Citrus Reticulata (Red Mandarin) Essential Oil*. 
*Organic Ingredient

name: Splish Splash
description:
This gentle and creamy baby wash is a great addition to your baby’s bath time. Add a generous squirt to the bath water and it will work its cleansing and soothing magic whilst your baby splashes around.

125ml

Water (Aqua), Aloe Barbadensis Miller (Aloe Vera) Juice*, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil*, ECOMulse USA (Glyceryl Stearate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Sodium Stearoyl Lactylate), Lauryl Glucoside,
Vegetable Glycerin*, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Oil*, Camellia Oleifera (Camellia) Oil*, Simmondsiachinensis (Jojoba) Oil*, Avena Sativa (Colloidal Oatmeal), Chamomilla Recutita (Chamomile) Extract*, Calendula Officinalis (Calendula) Infused Oil*, Honey*, Anthemis Nobilis (Chamomile Roman) Essential Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Essential Oil*, Organic Citrus Reticulata (Red Mandarin) Essential Oil*, Parfum (natural). 
* Organic Ingredient
